name: Core Markets
description: Core Markets stands as a best-in-class derivatives DEX on Blast, leveraging intents-based trading to deliver an unmatched trading experience with 250+ tradeable pairs at up to 60x leverage. Through our novel approach to intent-based derivatives trading, enhanced by the strategic use of USDB as yield-generating collateral and a unique user interface, Core provides a streamlined and effective trading journey. $CORE is the native token of Core Markets that is key to the platform's adoption and community ownership. As participants trade on Core Markets, they accumulate $CORE, through our Trade2Earn initiative. $CORE tokens can then be staked to obtain to a proportional share of the platform's profit, as well as a portion of net $CORE emissions. Importantly, both traders and stakers share any additional incentives obtained by Core Markets.
